articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Multiple casualties feared after 'terror attack' at Kashmir tourist hotspot, Indian police say - NBC News
articles.description: Multiple casualties are feared after assailants indiscriminately fired at tourists visiting a beauty spot in Indian-controlled Kashmir, officials said.
articles.content:
Multiple casualties are feared after assailants indiscriminately fired at tourists visiting a beauty spot in Indian-controlled Kashmir on Tuesday, officials said.
Police said it was a terror attack … [+1269 chars]

articles.title: India-US ties: Modi and Vance praise progress in trade talks as higher tariffs loom - BBC
articles.description: US Vice-President JD Vance is currently on a four-day visit to India with his wife and three children.
articles.content:
